thread.title: Trail Blazers vs. Golden State Warriors: Live updates and game chat
thread.title_full: Trail Blazers vs. Golden State Warriors: Live updates and game chat | OregonLive.com

author: Joe Freeman | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Trail Blazers vs. Golden State Warriors: Live updates and game chat
text:
The Portland Trail Blazers host the reigning NBA champion Golden State Warriors at 7 p.m. Thursday night at the Moda Center.
After missing the Blazers' first exhibition game against the Sacramento Kings because his wife was in labor , Al-Farouq Aminu is expected to start at small forward, marking his debut in a Portland uniform.
Watch : Game is on Comcast/Xfinity channel 37, or 737 for HD
Aminu's return means Blazers fans can sneak a peek at the team's new-look starting lineup, which is expected to include Damian Lillard, CJ McCollum, Aminu, Meyers Leonard and Mason Plumlee.
How will the lineup fare? Will Moe Harkless, who looked so impressive vs. the Kings, continue to push Aminu for the starting job? Will Noah Vonleh, who is making a claim for a rotation spot, continue to look more advanced than expected?
The comments section below will be open well before tipoff. Jump in and share your thoughts about these questions and the game.
Afterward, visit OregonLive.com/blazers for a recap and more coverage.
â€” Joe Freeman | jfreeman@oregonian.com | 503-294-5183 | @BlazerFreeman
